titles: A letter and declaration of the nobility and gentry of the county of York, to His Excellency the Lord Generall Monck.
publisher: Printed at York, and re-printed at London for John Starkey,
notes: Desiring the recall of the secluded members and the establishment of a Free Parliament.
The declaration is signed: Tho. Lord Fairfax [and 47 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Albemarle, George Monck, --  Duke of, 1608-1670 --  Early works to 1800.
England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
